WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Cautious
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction are risk-averse, they contribute to a conservative power in the league congress.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Merchant
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction are skilled in trade and commerce, favoring economic policies in the league congress.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Aggressive
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction are warlike and favor aggressive policies, often pushing for military expansion.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Strategist
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction are skilled in planning and tactics, balancing warfare and economic policies.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Industrialist
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction focus on resource optimization and economic growth, often at the expense of military priorities.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Militarist
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction prioritize military strength and weapon upgrades, often neglecting economic policies.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Diplomat
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction excel in negotiation and diplomacy, favoring peaceful resolutions over conflict.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Expansionist
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction prioritize territorial expansion and resource acquisition.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Pacifist
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction avoid conflict and focus on internal development and harmony.

WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.label: Defender
WarbandWarfareQuestline.FactionTraitDef.description: Leaders of this faction focus on protecting their territory and people, often resisting aggressive expansion.
